title: How to Make a Fried Egg Sandwich

steps.headline: Spread butter or mayonnaise on the two slices of bread.
Oil and heat a medium sized pan.
steps.description: Break two eggs in the heated pan and flick a dab of cooking oil on top of the egg yolks.

steps.headline: Fry your eggs to your liking.
Place the two eggs on one slice of bread.
steps.description: Dab any toppings you wish or anything else you want to add in your sandwich, for example lettuce or tomatoes.

steps.headline: Turn the other slice of bread over, so that the buttered side is towards the eggs.
steps.description: Cut your sandwich in half and enjoy.
